```{r}
# import libraries
library(circlize)
```

```{r}
par(mar=c(1, 1, 1, 1))

chordDiagram(
  matrix(1, 20, 20),
  col="black",
  symmetric=TRUE,
  transparency=0.85,
  annotationTrack=NULL
)
```
